error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'pages_per_contract' (132) was used instead of 'num_contracts' (2).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 2904
He has 132 contracts that are 132 pages each so that's 132*132 = <<132*132=17424>>17424 pages
He can only shred 6 pages at a time so it will take him 17424/6 = <<17424/6=2904>>2904 units
